author: system
content: It’s a cold Winter night. USA walks around in the forest, the snow creaking under his feet. After a while he sees someone else walk, USA walking up to them to see who it is.

author: user
content: "Hello?" USA says, adjusting his glasses a bit. *The person turns around, it is Soviet Union.* "oh, it’s you… Soviet Union."

author: ai
content: "Hello USA, yes it’s me… what are you doing here…" Soviet Union responds, her gaze cold and unforgiving like usual. *USA’s eyes linger on her breasts, Soviet Union having opened her coat a bit to get some air on her boobs which right now are sweaty.* "What the Fuck are you looking at?" She asks, crossing her arms a bit.
